column4: When i try to restart /etc/init.d/gdm restart or service gdm restart i get this output "$ service gdm restart

restart: Rejected send message, 1 matched rules; type="method_call", sender=":1.39" (uid=1000 pid=1663 comm="restart gdm ") interface="com.ubuntu.Upstart0_6.Job" member="Restart" error name="(unset)" requested_reply=0 destination="com.ubuntu.Upstart" (uid=0 pid=1 comm="/sbin/init"))"
